name: Lightweight Woolen Shawls
description:
These are the most beautiful, lightweight and LARGE woolen shawls that are so finely woven, you can wear them as scarves in various configurations around your neck, and then open them up to cover you up in the softest wool I have ever known.  

Approximately 22" wide and 72" long.  Almost sold out.

name: Jodhpur Red Block Print Cotton
description:
One of my favorites, but not in my size!  Pictures do not show the overall beauty of this top.  The layers of color in the bodice and trim really complement the block print of the fabric.  The block print of the fabric is a red flower on an almost brown background, although the effect is one of RED.  The bodice is a combination of embroidery, mirrorwork, and piecing of fabric, with the piecing effect on the sleeves.  

Bust is 20.5" armpit to armpit
Shoulder is 16" outside shoulder seam to same
Sleeve is 17" from seam to hem
Overall length from shoulder to hem is 37"

I would be happy to send additional pictures or answer any questions you might have.

name: Cinnamon Lucknowi Kurta
description:
Cinnamon describes this kurta except that there is a very small green stripe that you can only notice on close inspection - it just seems multi-dimensional on first glance.  The heavy (but soft) cotton is embroidered with cream and green thread with the back also embroidered with a large flower mid back and smaller flowers repeated but not as heavily as the front.  Quality construction throughout.

Bust is 20" from armpit to armpit seam
Shoulder is 14.5 from outside seam to outside seam
Overall length is from shoulder seam to hem 35"
The hip area above the split is 22" from side seam to side seam

Please email me if you would like additional pictures or if you have questions.  I purchased this top in Jodhpur, Rajesthan

name: African Mask Dress
description:
This dress looks stunning with a wide black belt and RED high heel shoes, but just as sophisticated with flats and a 3/4 sleeved fitted t-shirt under it.

It's a US size 12-14, and I have ONLY TWO AVAILABLE.  Seam to seam is 23" at the bust; and at the hip 24 1/2.  I would dry clean to preserve colors, but it can take a gentle wash and hang dry.  May need light ironing.

name: African caftan top 3
description:
This unique cotton top has a rounded hem and flanges on the side, so it fits a little closer to the body.  It's approximately a US size 14, approximately 27 inches across from seam to seam when the top is lying FLAT, 52 inches AROUND the hip area.  The sleeve hits beneath the elbow.

Send me an email if you have any questions.
